## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                   | Type     | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ----------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `color`  | `color`   | Colour of the proportion bar  | `string` | `'primary'` |
| `value`  | `value`   | proportion ( 0 <= value <= 1) | `number` | `0`         |
